snippet: Israel carried out extensive air attacks in response to heavy rocket fire and authorized a major call-up of army reserves for an extended campaign against militants in Gaza.
abstract: Israel and Hamas escalate their military confrontation, with Israeli warplanes striking 150 sites in Gaza in response to barrage of 40 longer-range rockets; Israel also authorizes major call-up of army reserves for an extended campaign against militants in Hamas-controlled Gaza.

byline.original: By STEVEN ERLANGER and ISABEL KERSHNER
byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Fares Akram from Gaza; Gabby Sobelman from Tel Aviv; Rina Castelnuovo from Sderot, Israel; Said Ghazali from Jerusalem; and Jodi Rudoren and Rick Gladstone from New York.

lead_paragraph: Israel carried out extensive air attacks in response to heavy rocket fire and authorized a major call-up of army reserves for an extended campaign against militants in Gaza.

headline.main: Israel and Hamas Trade Attacks as Tension Rises
headline.print_headline: Israel and Hamas Trade Attacks as Tension Rises
